name: AsyncAPI Documentation UI Audit
description:
This file represents a working UI audit for the AsyncAPI documentation generator as shown in AsyncAPI Studio.


What do we expect to get out of this audit:

  • View all UI components at a glance
  • Identify inconsistencies in current design and define "problems"
  • Use problems to establish solutions for a consistent design language


This is an open source project. If you would like to contribute to this project, head over to this Github issue.
